column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kai says : " Sorry what I 've said got you into trouble with your dad . "
#Text=Jinora says : " It 's not your fault .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Where did all the spirits go ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Where are the babies ?
#Text=" Ganbat says : " What are these kids doing in my camp ?
#Text=" Rustler # 1 says : " We caught them sneaking around .
#Text=Thought they might tell someone we 're here .
#Text=" Ganbat says : " They 're the new airbenders .
#Text=Must be living up in the temple .
#Text=Hurry up and gather the rest of the gang and let 's get out of here before someone comes looking for these kids .
#Text=I 'll take them to Ba Sing Se , with the rest of the fresh meat .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Tattoos .
#Text=How could she think ?
#Text=Focus .
#Text=Breathe .
#Text=Bumi ruins everything .
#Text=Inhale .
#Text=Focus .
#Text=" Pema says : " Taking a little break from teaching ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've failed .
#Text=Bumi quit , the rest of the airbenders want to go home .
#Text=Ca n't they see that I 'm trying to rebuild an entire culture ?
#Text=" Pema says : " You know , just because these people can airbend , it does n't automatically make them Air Nomads .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Tell me about it .
#Text=" Pema says : " I remembered when I moved down my parents ' house to become an Air Acolyte .
#Text=That first night I was so scared and lonely and the bed was so hard .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's actually better for your back .
#Text=Sorry .
#Text=" Pema says : " The point is : I really wanted to be there , but it still took time for me to adjust to feel like I was a part of it all .
#Text=The people are probably feeling the same way .
#Text=You have to be patient .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Now I know how Korra feels when I 'm talking to her .
#Text=Thank you , Pema .
#Text="
